paper.title: Upgrading the Pre- and Postcondition Technique
paper.venue: VDM '91 Proceedings of the 4th International Symposium of VDM Europe on Formal Software Development-Volume I: Conference Contributions - Volume I
paper.abstract: This paper gives a reconstruction of the classical pre- and postcondition technique from its roots and extends it with several features. A number of problems in connection with pre- and postcondition specifications are discussed and solutions presented. Problems that are discussed include: framing, dynamic object creation, non-atomic actions and user-friendly syntax. The technique as described is part of the specification language COLD-1 and has been used in several industrial applications.
